dataset_name.description: Identifier for the dataset associated with these results

method_name.description: Identifier for the method associated with these results

paramset_name.description: Identifier for the method parameter set associated with these results

paramset.description: Method parameter set for these results

run_duration_secs.description: Duration of the method run in seconds. Can be multiple if the method is a workflow.

run_cpu_pct.description: CPU usage percentage of the method run. Can be multiple if the method is a workflow.

run_peak_memory_mb.description: Peak memory usage of the method run in MB. Can be multiple if the method is a workflow.

run_disk_read_mb.description: Disk read usage of the method run in MB. Can be multiple if the method is a workflow.

run_disk_write_mb.description: Disk write usage of the method run in MB. Can be multiple if the method is a workflow.

run_exit_code.description: Exit code of the method run. Can be multiple if the method is a workflow.

metric_values.description: List of metric values in the same order as metric_names
